website_summaries.verdict: Low fat option that provides a burst of flavor, appealing to most cats.
pros: Chicken listed as the first ingredient
Contains vitamins and minerals essential for eye and digestive health
Provides safe and effective weight loss
cons: Food sits at a slightly higher price point

customer_reviews.title: I figured it would be great. Turns out
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old tabbies were getting a bit too round around the middle and the vet suggested I try changing up their food. I initially tried a very expensive, all-protein brand that had an ingredients list out of an Atkins-Diet handbook. I figured it would be great. Turns out, not so much. The cats loved it, but even with their portions well-controlled, the weight only increased. It wasn't until I changed to the Nutro Weight Loss formula last year that I began seeing results. All of my cats lost a few pounds each and their activity increased accordingly (and I'm happy because this stuff is about $20 less per bag than the all-protein stuff was).
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Morth

customer_reviews.title: My cats are eating it.
customer_reviews.text: My cats seem to love it. When I was changing them over from another brand, I was sneaky and yelled TREATIES! and tossed a handful onto the kitchen floor like I do with treats. That worked for about three days before they caught on and got suspicious. But by then I was already mixing this in with their old food. No tummy problems, and we think their fur is feeling softer than it used to. Hard to say if it's helping with their weight yet or not.
customer_reviews.author: Tymber Dalton

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this food, but are satisfied and don't overeat
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food, but are satisfied and don't overeat. They are slightly overweight and are not likely to loose weight, but also don’t seem to gain on it either. I work odd hours and it is import to allow for free feeding without worrying about obesity and this allows for that. They seem to be satisfied by eating less than they do with some others, so it can be left available without being so disgusting that they wont touch it, or so delicious they eat it all at once and get sick or run out.
customer_reviews.author: bluchez

customer_reviews.title: Recent Batch made my cats violently ill
customer_reviews.text: Have been buying this food thru Amazon ( Nutro Weight Management Cat Dry) for years. The last batch made my cats violently ill almost immediately. Amazon replaced the first bag, but now I'm stuck and can't return the replacement, which I was hoping would be a different production date. Production code/expiration date in photo. Amazon should allow you to return pet food just received in these situations. I will now buy all my pet food ( $100 a month) from Chewy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Blank

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price, cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've got three cats and each one has a different issue. One has intestinal issues and the other two need to lose weight. Within three months, the two chunky monkeys lost a little over one pound each (cats need to lose weight slowly to be safe) and the pea protein gave the one with tummy issues the fiber he requires so his poop isn't runny. The price is way cheaper than the other stuff out thete, yet it contains high quality ingredients. Three paws up!
customer_reviews.author: Miss T.

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it and lost weight
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats that were starting to look a bit chunky because they aren't very active. They had been eating another Nutro food, and I decided to mix it with this lower calorie food. They eagerly ate it despite the different flavor (previously had only bought fish flavored food), so I decided to switch to just this. They still eagerly eat it when served, and they have definitely lost weight. Their skin and fur still look healthy, and I feel better giving a normal portion of this food than trying to decrease the old food
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Schwartz-Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not helping with my cat's weight. :(
customer_reviews.text: Visited a hospital and the vet recommended prescribed cat food to lose weight since both of my cats are overweighted. Told her I wanted to try with this food first, and now I am on the third bag, and my cats haven't lost a single pound. I don't know if it's because of this food with lower calories, but after feeding this, my cats are asking for food more frequently. Figured out regular food recommended 3/4 cups for 22lb cat, and this recommended 1 cup (for weight reduction) for 16lb cat! You will be end up feeding them more. I am going back to the regular food after finishing what i have left.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: My cats aren't a fan of this food, but.....
customer_reviews.text: ... but I blame myself for feeding them junk food for such a long time. To them, this is probably like me eating my least favorite vegetable. But, they're over weight and their coats look terrible, so the food stays! I'm eagerly waiting for a few months to go by to see if their overall health and weight improves.
customer_reviews.author: ctescar

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes You Have To Pay For Something A Little Better
customer_reviews.text: Our slightly overweight cat needed weight management cereal to avoid the dangers of diabetes as he get older. Nutro is the brand he chose and has been enjoying these past couple of years. The biggest advantage of Nutro is that it does not cause the cat to vomit (Feline regurgitation) with the annoying messes on the carpet. Also, Tommy-Cat has shed a couple of pounds and is looking fit and slender when he visits the doctor. We pay more for Nutro because we care about our cat's well-being. These things do make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best weight control formulation for cats.
customer_reviews.text: This food works better than any other weight control formula. My cat loves it, feels satisfied, less stool and nice package opening tab. Best of all she is losing weight on this formula and hasn’t on other weight control formulas!
customer_reviews.author: Mischle

customer_reviews.title: Our love this! Our super picky cat decided to switch ...
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love this! Our super picky cat decided to switch from his Purina Gentle Food he had been eating for years to this food after he tasted it. He literally turned his nose up at his old food and went to this. He's also not having as many digestive issues (i.e. throwing up) as he was after switching to this food. The cat I bought it for has lost a little bit of weight so far, too, and her skinny brother has been maintaining his weight on it. The only con is the cost, but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it! Rare for four cats to agree, especially given that it’s the weight management. Very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: SquarelyCentral

customer_reviews.title: This food smells!
customer_reviews.text: I keep a bowl of this food in my bedroom when a friend's dog visits and my cats hide out. It really smells and as soon as the dog leaves and my cats have free roam of the house, I move the bowl out. Maybe a different flavor would smell less?
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: so to find it on here for less and not have to go to petsmart just for one item every month is fantastic. I had a vet years ago
customer_reviews.text: I've always purchased this food at petsmart for more, so to find it on here for less and not have to go to petsmart just for one item every month is fantastic. I had a vet years ago recommend this food as its main ingredient is meat. My cat liked it right away and it's all she has eaten for almost 8 years now. She's still chubby, so not sure how good it is for weight loss, but she loves it and that is what matters to me. It has also kept her healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Del R Frohlich

customer_reviews.title: The hero you never knew you needed
customer_reviews.text: I substituted this for the hamburger in Hamburger Helper. The textural components of the cat food compliment the noodles impressively well. Gone are the days of waiting for the meat to brown and draining the fat. I hope they come out with halibut and birch flavor soon!
customer_reviews.author: Quarkscr3w

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Was not happy to learn that Nutro had once again discontinued one of its’ products. We were relieved that our beloved cat loved the replacement. She gets wet food alternating with this and seems very happy people food is her favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a picky eater who does not like small kibbles. It is really hard to find bigger ones in the market and I am glad I came across this one. My cat really loves it. This is my kitty’s 2nd bag and I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: JasoninNH

customer_reviews.title: Luca loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this food, and more importantly, my Luca loves it. It's important for me that the food he eats is the best available at a price that I can afford. And this food meets and exceeds my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Kleba

customer_reviews.title: No smelly farts!
customer_reviews.text: Weird. Amazon asked how the flavor is. I cannot attest to that. However, my dog seems to enjoy it. Today she ate it so fast that she puked on the rug. Dang dog. Anyways, this is the only dogfood that doesn’t give her horrific farts so that’s an A+ in my book. Plus, she really seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Cat approves
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a cat who's a picky eater but eats a lot. He approves!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Everywhere

customer_reviews.title: High fiber, low fat, happy cats
customer_reviews.text: This is the closet grain including OTC diet I have found to the Rx weight management diet that my cats benefit from. I do still add Glandex powder to their food since they require extra fiber in their diet but they love this food.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it! One of the lowest calorie weight management foods
customer_reviews.text: This food is a lifesaver. My cat is very overweight and he's so picky. I have tried many high-quality low-cal Foods for him and been unsuccessful. This is the first weight management food that he likes and I'm able to keep his daily caloric intake low enough that he's starting to lose a few ounces.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Penn

customer_reviews.title: Works for our chunky monkeys
customer_reviews.text: This has helped our two chubby buddies start to lose weight. Cats require time to lose, and they have lost a little over a pound in about four months (that's a good thing). All of them love the flavor, too.
customer_reviews.author: Miss T.

customer_reviews.title: Discontinued
customer_reviews.text: This product was awesome! Sad to see it go. Switched to wellness weight management once it was pulled from the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Schuyler

customer_reviews.title: helpful for kitty weightloss
customer_reviews.text: my 17 pound cat has lost 1 pound since starting this food about 2 months ago. We are of course also monitoring how much of this food she is eating so i am sure that it's a mix, but it appears to be the lowest calorie food that i could find on the market. i would recommend this food as a weight loss option cats.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ball

customer_reviews.title: Item is discontinued
customer_reviews.text: Sad to see this version discontinued. I have fed my cat this for probably 3-4 years. She was able to transition to another variety of this same brand after some trial and error.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Picky cat approves, thank goodness!
customer_reviews.text: Very picky male cat, usually will only eat fish can food. I feed both can and this dry food.
customer_reviews.author: Ann with an E, Anne

customer_reviews.title: He loves it and gets super excited when it is time to eat
customer_reviews.text: My cat has lost 3 pounds eating this three times a day (1/4 cup). He loves it and gets super excited when it is time to eat. Very happy with this product. I will use the same brand when I go back to regular food eventually.
customer_reviews.author: NLS

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it, arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day earlier than expected. Packed well in a box. Cats love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie B

customer_reviews.title: My fat cat loves this food
customer_reviews.text: This is the lowest calorie cat food I could find. It fills my fat cat up and he has slimmed down a little, but I still need to limit the amount of food.
customer_reviews.author: T. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: 3rd repurchase...should say it all ;)
customer_reviews.text: Both cats love this & are developing very well (both cats less than 2 yrs old). This was a repurchase & I will continue to do so. Their pricing is the best that I could find anywhere online or in local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Gemy_Scottish_lass

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My cat will not eat anything else and has lost weight since she has been on this food.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Casler

customer_reviews.title: Blessing
customer_reviews.text: This food is great for cats that need way more than the standard 2-3% fiber. My cat can finally have healthy poops again at half the cost of Rx food.
customer_reviews.author: and

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Our cat will eat it, but not tasty enough to overeat.
customer_reviews.author: Ski

customer_reviews.title: won't eat
customer_reviews.text: My cats will not eat this food they look at it sniff it walk away now feeding to the feral cats guess they do not care.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this stuff. Makes for some gnarly odors later down the road, but they seem very healthy. No digestive issues unless they eat too fast, which is very rare. Good product that I order on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: 👕 Diz n Dat 👚

customer_reviews.title: Cat hates it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cat. He would rather starve. He refused to eat it for days and would steal from the dog’s food... which is the same brand. I’m at a loss
customer_reviews.author: Joules Heyman

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy Nutro natural choice. However, my cats didn't lose any weight on it, but we didn't stay on it very long before I had to switch to something my older cat could eat. I tried to separate my other 2 cats food with hers, but that wasn't working, so had to switch everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Dancy

customer_reviews.title: Good Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: Love knowing this is a weight management food. Our cat loves this brand, we tried switching her to another one and wouldn't even eat it!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: My dog loved
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 11 yo and she loves this food!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Baker

customer_reviews.title: Worked for our old sickly cat.
customer_reviews.text: Feeding old cat with little appetite. This worked for us.
customer_reviews.author: Falconeye

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: She is a very finicky eater and has no problem w/ this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. White

customer_reviews.title: Not for my cats
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely not be purchasing this product again. All four of my cats don't like it, and one of them gets sick. They'll only eat it if nothing else is offered.
customer_reviews.author: Tory Richards

customer_reviews.title: Enjoys but slight issue
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes the food, but since switching I’ve noticed that she is constipated.. maybe it’s just not right for her system - am switching to a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Fast

customer_reviews.title: Lupan & Ollie have No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: The boys love it. And I love the fact that there is a resealable tab
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Wouters

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work to manage weight
customer_reviews.text: The cat doesn't seem to mind this, and it does help keep her weight down.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: not a fave
customer_reviews.text: My cat eats this, but it's not his favorite. I have to feed my other cats separately because he prefers their food. He's a fatty, which is why I got it. Too soon to tell if it will help him lose weight.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this not sure if he is loosing any weight as he is a very large cat and loves to eat but will continue to use the product because he likes it. Hard to cut back a 20 pound cat when he wants his food.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond C. Robbelamazon

customer_reviews.title: Easy transition from old food to this one
customer_reviews.text: So far she is okay eating this. It wasnt a hard transition from Iams to Nutro. One thing I have noticed so far, and shes only been eating this food for like a week, but she is normally a barfer, and she hasnt barfed.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great food bad package
customer_reviews.text: I love this food for my cats but I wish this bag was resealable.
customer_reviews.author: Sami Felcman

customer_reviews.title: Good for weight control
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this food and it’s controling her weight - she doesn’t seem to be hungry all day long, either.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Cat wouldn’t touch it
customer_reviews.text: My cat refused to eat this food under any circumstances. I thought she would resort to it after a while of no other options, but she wouldn’t go near it. After a few days, I even tried to mix it with her favorite wet cat foods and she still wouldn’t take one bite. Had to resort back to buying her original dry food.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Haase

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My fat cat loves this food. He turns his nose up at other brands now, AND he's lost weight.
customer_reviews.author: longjanesillvrr

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Caused both cats to throw up. Guess that's one way towards weight loss...
customer_reviews.author: shells

customer_reviews.title: The previous bag I got the cats loved but this one they would not eat
customer_reviews.text: Nutro must have changed the formula. The previous bag I got the cats loved but this one they would not eat. The kibbles look different and had a different consistency. Now I am stuck with a big bag of food that I cannot use.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy J

customer_reviews.title: Corey & Topanga Eat This Up!
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love it, no problems at all. Since one is a little chunkier than the other we mix this with the Indoor Adult formula.
customer_reviews.author: Reed Phillips Radio

customer_reviews.title: My cats gobble this food up but I haven't noticed ...
customer_reviews.text: My cats gobble this food up but I haven't noticed any weight loss in my "fat cat" - the more picky cat loves the taste of this food though so that's why it gets 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: ji973245

customer_reviews.title: My kitty is a purebred Siberian. He has an ...
customer_reviews.text: My kitty is a purebred Siberian. He has an eating disorder. He wants to eat all the time. Lol. He loves this stuff and he's lost about 3 pounds with it
customer_reviews.author: DGeorge

customer_reviews.title: feeding the recommended amount. This is bag two so I expect ...
customer_reviews.text: No weight loss yet, feeding the recommended amount. This is bag two so I expect to see results soon. Cat seems to love it, or maybe she just loves any food! Decent list of ingredients
customer_reviews.author: mrssmiley

customer_reviews.title: ... fat cat will eat it but doesn't seem to like it as much as the other brands he has ...
customer_reviews.text: My fat cat will eat it but doesn't seem to like it as much as the other brands he has eaten, but that's a good thing since he shouldn't each as much.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky T

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this dry food and since it is weight management I leave a bowl of it out around the clock and he hasn’t gained any weight.
customer_reviews.author: Robe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cat is eating it so far. I think she lost a little weight
customer_reviews.author: mario luciani

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is the only weight loss cat food that my cat seems to like. No recalls in history that I can find, made in the US and low in fat.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kitties love this food, and it did help them lose weight safely.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have one kitty with food allergies and another with ...
customer_reviews.text: I have one kitty with food allergies and another with a sensitive stomach. They can both eat this food with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: angela mcgowan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cat did not like it at all. And did not lose weight either
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: ... the old food and they all seem to really enjoy the transition to using this food
customer_reviews.text: We started to mix this cat food in with the old food and they all seem to really enjoy the transition to using this food. I like nutro products and it is definitely quality food and we got it for a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this food!. She licks the ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this food!. She licks the bowl clean when she has finished. She had been chunky, but has lost weight by eating this food.
customer_reviews.author: MeeMaw S

customer_reviews.title: A very good, reasonably priced healthy weight cat food,
customer_reviews.text: My cat is very happy with this food. He is doing well on it, and his allergies aren't bothering him.
customer_reviews.author: RSpirit22

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Took awhile for my cat to like it but its keeping her weight down.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Quintanilla

customer_reviews.title: The best. I don't know a cat yet that doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: The best. I don't know a cat yet that doesn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Apex

customer_reviews.title: Good food for fat cats :)
customer_reviews.text: My fat cat likes and is less fat since she started eating it.
customer_reviews.author: lv2read

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best pet food fur and eyes look great in a matter of weeks
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Laughery

customer_reviews.title: Great Weight Loss Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: My formerly tubby cat likes this food. Her coat and activity levels are great. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Laub

customer_reviews.title: Premium cat food at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: The cats love it, that’s good enough for me, and it’s cheaper on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Mogielnicki

customer_reviews.title: Smells better than other cat foods
customer_reviews.text: My cat love it better than other weight management food
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this food. It came quick and sealed in a fresh bag!
customer_reviews.author: Scott F

customer_reviews.title: My picky cat loves this food. I am not ...
customer_reviews.text: My picky cat loves this food. I am not sure if it will help her lose weight, too soon to tell. But she gobbles this up.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves the stuff and it's cheaper here than the store!
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My two cats love this. And the price keeps dropping!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Roska

customer_reviews.title: My picky cat doesn't like it.
customer_reviews.text: My cat eats it, but I can tell that she doesn't like it. She'll have a full bowl and will beg for food. After I tell her that she's not getting anything different (as if she can understand me!) and walk out of the kitchen, she reluctantly eats it. Her health is pretty good, other than being chubby, and has no evidence of digestional problems. I think it's that she just doesn't like this one. Other kibbles are just fine for her, so we'll be switching when this one runs out. It's really a shame because I like the quality of the ingredients and nutrition in this food.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith R.

customer_reviews.title: Good cat weight loss option
customer_reviews.text: Cat loves it, and lost a little weight as well!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Uhland

customer_reviews.title: Not for the Picky and Fat
customer_reviews.text: We fed our two house cats dry food for most of their lives, and they quickly porked up! Our vet suggested weight loss food, and we selected Nutro for its reputation. (We had been feeding Nature's Recipe regular dry food.) Our two chunky monkeys didn't particularly care for the change, and we ultimately switched to canned food, which has proven better for weight control and a huge hit in our house. The two cats will beg for lettuce from us, so they must have rather hated this brand. Lesson learned!
customer_reviews.author: NutmegMomma

customer_reviews.title: so good with grain is not a good idea
customer_reviews.text: My cat over eats, so good with grain is not a good idea. He threw up from over eating on this food. Grain-free food he doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea
